summary: This bill, the Preparing and Resourcing Our Student Parents and Early Childhood Teachers Act (PROSPECT Act), aims to establish federal grants for community colleges and minority-serving institutions. The grants are designed to support the creation and expansion of infant and toddler child care, the training of early childhood educators, and provide support for student parents. The bill includes provisions for planning, access, impact, and pipeline grants, as well as modifications to the Child Care and Development Block Grant Program.
